channel.title: Save/Print Notepad on Quickly How Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Save/Print Notepad on Quickly How Tutorials

item.title: How to Print in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Print: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut How to Exit the Print Window How to Add a Printer How to Change the Number of Copies How to Print to File How to Let Notepad Change Printing Preferences How to Print on Both Sides No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a video tutorial: How to Print With Menu Step 1: First open a Notepad file.

item.title: How to Save in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Save a File: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut How to Save As: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut How to Save Multiple Files: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Save a File With Menu Step 1: First edit a Notepad file. In the upper left click the “File” button. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Save”.
